cards.Name: Aguateca, Blood of Yucatán
cards.Claim: Fiery Judgment (Claim): Deal 4 damage, then 5 damage, and then 6 damage to up to three different poisoned enemy characters.
cards.Passive: Shared Destiny (Passive): Damage that would be done to friendly Yucatec characters may be allocated between friendly Yucatec characters instead.
cards.Special: Blood Rites (Special): Remove a character with an Honour the Gods ability in your forgotten zone from the game: You may activate that Honour the Gods ability (you must still pay its cost).

cards.Name: Ixchel, the Moon
cards.Passive:
Lunar Eminence (Passive): At the start of each contest phase, if you control another Yucatec character; you may swap the Power and Initiative of the character contesting Ixchel, the Moon until the end of the turn.

Scale-Clan Poison (Passive): Characters that contest this character become poisoned.
cards.Special: Honor the Gods (Special): Remove 13 damage from Yucatec characters on the field, then sacrifice a friendly Yucatec character: Add ** Yucatec character from your deck or forgotten zone to your hand.

cards.Name: Náajal, the Halach Uinic
cards.Claim: Pantheon (Claim): Remove any number of Prophet characters in your forgotten zone from the game: Activate the Claim effect of each Prophet character removed this way.
cards.Passive: Toxicologist (Passive): Characters that contest Yucatec characters become poisoned. Double all poison damage.
cards.Special: Yucatec Scale-Clan (Special): All friendly Yucatec characters gain Power, Armour and Initiative equal to the number of other friendly Yucatec characters until the end of the turn.

cards.Name: Kinich Ahau, the Sun
cards.Passive:
Solar Eminence P: At the start of each contest phase, if you control another Yucatec character; you may swap Kinich Ahau, the Sun’s Power and Initiative until the end of the turn.

Scale-Clan Poison P: Characters that contest this character become poisoned.
cards.Special: Honor the Gods S: Remove 13 damage from Yucatec characters on the field, then sacrifice a friendly Yucatec character: Add a ** Yucatec character from your deck or forgotten zone to your hand.

cards.Name: Chuc'ah, the Holcan
cards.Passive: Prize Collector (Passive): When a friendly Yucatec character defeats an enemy character; place it under Chuc'ah, the Holcan. Chuc'ah, the Holcan gains 2 Power and Life for each character under it. Characters under friendly Yucatec characters may be sacrificed when activating an Honor the Gods ability.
cards.Special: Hostage Exchange (Special): Send 4 characters under Chuc'ah, the Ocelotl to their owner's forgotten zone: Return a Yucatec character from your forgotten zone to your hand.

cards.Name: Ah Kin Mai, the Owl
cards.Claim: Oracular Messenger C: Search your deck for a Prophet character, and add it to your hand. Resolve the added card's Claim effect.
cards.Special: Honor the Gods S: If you have 5 Prophet characters with different names in your forgotten zone, remove 10 damage from Yucatec characters on the field and sacrifice Ah Kin Mai, the Owl: Play a * * * Yucatec character from your deck or forgotten zone into an open slot.

cards.Name: Prophet of Cuchumaquic
cards.Claim: Fate Twist (Claim): Move up to 3 damage from a friendly Yucatec character to any other character.
cards.Passive: Red Rivers (Passive): At the end of each turn; you may move 1 damage from any character to another.

cards.Name: Prophet of Chaac
cards.Claim: Chaac's Deluge (Claim): During the next contest phase, enemy characters attack last.
cards.Passive: Sodden (Passive): Your opponent cannot move their poisoned characters.

cards.Name: Prophet of Itzamna
cards.Claim: Itzamna's Light C: Choose a friendly Yucatec character: Until the beginning of your next turn, it cannot be defeated or be dealt damage.
cards.Passive: Empower P: All other friendly damaged Yucatec characters gain 1 Power. All other friendly undamaged Yucatec characters gain 2 Power.

cards.Name: Yucatec Scale-Temple
cards.Passive: Stone Protector P: Damage that would be done to friendly Yucatec characters that are adjacent to Yucatec Scale-Temple may be placed on Yucatec Scale-Temple instead.
cards.Special: Yucatán S: Activate the Claim ability of a friendly Yucatec character.

cards.Name: Camalotz, the Bloodletter
cards.Passive:
Blood-Forged (Passive): When Camalotz, the Bloodletter defeats a poisoned character; you may move 3 damage from Camalotz, the Bloodletter to another character. 

Doomed (Passive): If you don't control another Yucatec character, send Camalotz, the Bloodletter to the forgotten zone.
cards.Special: Poison Dart (Special): Choose an enemy character: It becomes poisoned.

cards.Name: Kukulkan, the Feathered Serpent
cards.Claim: Visions of Yucatán (Claim): Move 2 other friendly Yucatec characters into open slots: Move up to 2 enemy characters into open slots. Only Yucatec characters may activate Claim effects as a result of being moved by Visions of Yucatán.
cards.Passive: Revered (Passive): Move a friendly Prophet character to an uncontested open slot.

cards.Name: Vucub-Caquix, the Deceiver
cards.Passive: Flight of Fancy (Passive): Each damage you remove from friendly Yucatec characters when paying the cost of an Honor the Gods ability may be counted as 2.
cards.Special: Feather Weather (Special) Place the poison token on any number of characters: Vucub-Caquix, the Deceiver gains 2 Power and 1 Initiative for each token placed until the end of the turn.

cards.Name: Camazotz, the Exiled
cards.Claim: Banish (Claim): Remove a card in either forgotten zone from the game.
cards.Special: Honor the Gods (Special): Remove 15 damage from Yucatec characters on the field, then sacrifice a friendly Yucatec character: Look at your opponent's hand, and choose a card. Your opponent discards that card.

cards.Name: Blood Pact
cards.Effect: Remove all damage from all characters: Allocate that damage between any number of characters.

cards.Name: Náajal's Gaze
cards.Effect:
Until the end of the round, replace the effects of the poison token with the following:

- This character's Initiative and Armour becomes 0.
- This character cannot be moved, except by another card's effect.
- At the end of each turn; place 2 damage on this character.

cards.Name: Prophet of Acan
cards.Claim: Round One (Claim): All enemy characters become poisoned.
cards.Passive: Brew Buddy (Passive): As Prophet of Acan enters play, choose another friendly Yucatec character. It gains 3 Life. Damage that would be done to Prophet of Acan or that character may be allocated between them instead.

cards.Name: Prophet of Huracan
cards.Claim: Winds of Huracan (Claim): Select an enemy character, or a Yucatec character: Move it to an open slot.
cards.Passive: Leafstorm (Passive): Reduce the Armour of all poisoned enemy characters by 2.

cards.Name: Prophet of Kisin
cards.Claim: Stranglehold C: Your opponent is limited to playing up to 1 card in their next turn.
cards.Passive: Xibalban Grasp (Passive):  If a poisoned character would be sent to the forgotten zone, place it under Prophet of Kisin instead. When Prophet of Kisin leaves the field; send characters under it to their owner's forgotten zone. Yucatec characters gain 1 life for each character under Prophet of Kisin.

cards.Name: Xibalba, Place of Fear
cards.Claim: Deadly Games (Claim): Discard a character: Defeat a character on the field with Power less than that of the discarded character.
cards.Special: Honor the Gods (Special): Remove 30 damage from Yucatec characters on the field, then sacrifice a friendly Yucatec character: Play up to 2 Yucatec characters from your forgotten zone to open slots.

cards.Name: Immolation
cards.Effect: During this turn, when you activate an Honor the Gods ability, you may treat enemy characters as if they were friendly Yucatec characters when paying the cost (you may remove damage from them and you may sacrifice them).
